Mayor & City Council
====================

Meetings
--------

The mayor and council meet every second Thursday of each Month at City Hall.

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

[Most Recent Agenda](https://www.ci.selma.tx.us/AgendaCenter/MostRecent/City-Council-4-4 "View Most Recent") | [View All Agendas and Minutes](https://www.ci.selma.tx.us/AgendaCenter/City-Council-4)

Overview
--------

The City of Selma is governed by the mayor and five-member City Council under the general law type A format. The Elected Officials that represent the citizens of Selma are:

![City of Selma](https://www.ci.selma.tx.us/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=2153 "City of Selma")
